name: XWUI Range Slider Component
description: Dual-thumb slider component for selecting a range of values. Wraps XWUISlider with range mode enabled. Supports min/max values, steps, marks, and tooltips. Uses XWUISlider internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

range.description: Whether range mode is enabled (always true for RangeSlider)

marks.description: Marks to display on the slider

tooltip.description: Whether to show tooltip with current value

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the range slider

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
